actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Burdick without amendment. With written report No. 100-501.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 922.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Cleared for White House.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 100-464.

official_title: A bill to designate Soldier Creek Diversion Unit in Topeka, Kansas, as the "Lewis M. Paramore Diversion Unit".

summary.text: Designates the Soldier Creek Diversion Unit in Topeka, Kansas, as the Lewis M. Paramore Diversion Unit.

titles.title: A bill to designate Soldier Creek Diversion Unit in Topeka, Kansas, as the "Lewis M. Paramore Diversion Unit".
